parameter.name: help_in_main_menu_command
parameter.description: The help command or selection number that at the main menu to give instructions to players.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.description: The expected output when the player input help command in the main menu

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.description: The expected output when the player input a wrong selection in the main menu

parameter.name: start_game_command
parameter.description: The start game command or selection number that at the main menu to start the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.description: The expected output when the player start the game.

parameter.name: help_in_game
parameter.description: The help command that in the main menu to give available commands list to players.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.description: The expected output when the player input the help command in the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.description: The expected output when the player input the command ls

parameter.name: direction
parameter.description: A destination name for moving the player into a room or someplace. Assume that the player just got into the game and did nothing.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.description: The expected output when the player input a wrong selection in the main menu.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.description: The expected output when the player input 'cd ..'

parameter.name: check_inventory_command
parameter.description: The check-inventory command in the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.description: The expected output when the player does NOT get the item.

parameter.name: directions
parameter.description: A path from the starting point towards the room or place which contains an item. Separate the path by ','. Example: 'home,living room,bedroom'

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.description: The expected output when the player picks up the item which you guide to in the parameter 'directions'.

parameter.name: check_inventory_command
parameter.description: The check-inventory command in the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.description: The expected output AFTER the player got the item.

parameter.name: directions
parameter.description: A path from the room or place where the player just picked up an item towards victory. Separate the path by ','. Example: '..,..,..,forest'

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.description: The expected output when the player wins the game.

parameter.name: exit_command
parameter.description: The exit game command or selection number that at the main menu to exit the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.description: The expected output when the player exits the game.
